header1: Supply and procurement of equipment for the oil industry
header2: Services for providing special equipment and vehicles
header3: Comprehensive solutions in the field of electric power
header4: Cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems
welcome_message: We are pleased to welcome you to our company's website!
about_description: We are a dynamically growing company specializing in providing a wide range of services for various industries.
activity_scope: Our activities cover several key areas, each of which we guarantee with professionalism and quality:
oil_equipment_supply: Supply of equipment for the oil industry
vehicle_services: Services for providing special equipment and vehicles
ventilation_services: Cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems
our_approach: We value a personalized approach and strive for long-term cooperation to be a reliable partner for every client.
our_goal: To become a key partner in shaping a strong and modern economy of Turkmenistan through our comprehensive approach and high service standards.
company_intro: IE 'SAHETLI HYZMAT' actively contributes to the development of the country by providing reliable and effective services in several strategically important areas: meeting transportation and construction needs through the rental of special equipment and passenger transportation; comprehensive supply of specialized equipment for the oil industry; strengthening the energy sector through advanced solutions; and maintaining a healthy and safe environment through ventilation system maintenance. We build trust through quality, responsibility, and commitment to shared success.
oil_equipment_description: We are a reliable supplier of high-quality equipment for the oil industry that meets the strictest international standards.
equipment_intro: Our company provides specialized equipment to carry out a wide range of tasks in the construction, industrial, oil, and energy sectors.
rental_offer: We offer modern special equipment for rent to perform any tasks — from earthworks to construction and logistics.
transport_services: Our company also offers transportation services of any complexity – from individual to large group transfers. We will select the right vehicle for any task and number of passengers.
energy_solutions: We provide comprehensive solutions in the field of electric power, including equipment supply, installation, and maintenance of electrical networks and systems.
duct_cleaning_info: Duct cleaning helps to meet sanitary standards, compliance with which affects the well-being and health of every person. This is important both in residential spaces and workplaces where people spend a lot of time.
cleaning_capability: We are fully equipped with modern equipment and have a team of qualified specialists to carry out the cleaning and disinfection process effectively and with high quality.
duct_diagnostics_description: Duct diagnostics using special equipment allows real-time assessment of the internal wall condition, degree of contamination, and types of deposits. Ventilation video inspection enables efficient and high-quality system cleaning and improves the microclimate conditions of industrial facilities.
what_you_get: By contacting us, you will receive:
video_inspection_order: You can order a video inspection of the facility from our company. An experienced specialist with the appropriate qualifications and training will quickly identify network defects, assess the degree of material degradation, and determine the cause of the blockage. Order ventilation cleaning from our company — we provide a comprehensive solution to ductwork problems.
full_support: From consultation to implementation — we support the client at every stage, offering a complete solution tailored to the task.
trusted_tech_suppliers: We work with proven technologies and suppliers, ensuring consistent results.
responsive_service: We respond quickly to requests, adapt to tasks, and ensure timely delivery and execution.
deep_industry_understanding: Deep understanding of the industry enables offering well-founded and competent technical solutions.
clear_and_quick_explanation: We quickly and clearly explain any of your questions.
best_solutions_offer: We are ready to offer you the best solutions. We will work closely with you at every stage and provide the necessary consultations.
qualityAndSafetyServices: Laboratory services for quality and labor safety
innovativeSolutions: We offer high-quality services with innovative solutions
address: Turkmenistan, c. Ashgabat, Nobat Bagshy street (Leningradskaya), 2
contactPageTxt: You can contact us with any questions — we will respond promptly and provide the necessary assistance.
contactPageFormTxt3: Fill out the form or call us.
